description: Mastering Japanese flavours is easy with this dish, where chicken thighs are coated in a tasty marinade consisting of soy sauce, sake, mirin and garlic.
name: Chicken Yakitori Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the heat and divide into bowls, along with steamed rice and broccolini. Spoon over sauce and garnish with spring onion. Serve.
